amendment.description: An amendment numbered 140 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to enforce subsection (b) of Section 1259 of the John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (defunds a waiver that could otherwise allow the PRC to participate in Rim of the Pacific naval exercises).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
